WTF?! - Dom Davis - ACCU 2025
---

What do Boolean logic, bistromathics, and the Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy have in common? In this entertaining and thought-provoking talk, we explore unconventional ideas about computation, logic, and the chaotic nature of the human mind.

Starting with Douglas Adams’ whimsical concept of flying by missing the ground, the speaker draws unexpected connections between everyday experiences and technical systems—posing serious questions about how we understand truth tables, logic gates, and the limits of artificial intelligence (AI). Is AGI a doomed pursuit? Can we really model the human brain with digital systems? What happens when we abandon binary thinking and venture into analog, neurodivergent, or emergent models of computation?

You’ll discover how creative computing intersects with pattern recognition, chaotic cognition, and the philosophy of computing—where non-binary logic and complex syste
title: WTF?! - Dom Davis - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
